scripts.dev: concurrently -n BACKEND,ADMIN,CONSUMER -c green,blue,magenta "npm run start:dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix admin" "npm run dev --prefix consumer"
scripts.build: concurrently -n BACKEND,ADMIN,CONSUMER -c green,blue,magenta "npm run build --prefix backend" "npm run build --prefix admin" "npm run build --prefix consumer"
scripts.start: concurrently -n BACKEND,ADMIN,CONSUMER -c green,blue,magenta "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run preview --prefix admin" "npm run preview --prefix consumer"
